Stay Connected with Friday Connect!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=251&user=10620> 	

Clear communication and collaboration are essential for a thriving workplace, and Friday Connect is our India team's dedicated platform to enhance both. Held on the last Friday of each month, this 20-minute stand-up meeting brings together all back-office employees to align on key projects, priorities, and upcoming initiatives.

<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-1-min.png> 	

Daum Reopens its Store in Dubai

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=252&user=10620> 	

In honor of the opening of the Daum boutique at the Dubai Mall, Tanagra hosted an exclusive launch event on the 30th of January. Bringing luxury and artistry to life, the evening consisted of the unveiling of Daum’s new incense burner... Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=252&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

JACQUEMUS LIMITED-EDITION GOLD CAPSULE 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/970c51d2244d3043a4d509d9c50a6f561520339084.gif> 	

Jacquemus launches its first-ever Ramadan collection — the Gold Capsule, a limited-edition lineup of iconic pieces in gold, silver, and green. Discover the collection in-store at our Dubai Mall boutique and online here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=253&user=10620>  (UAE) and KSA here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=254&user=10620>  (KSA). Log in with your Chalhoub credentials to enjoy your employee discount at checkout when shopping online.

chunks.text:
Jacquemus launches its first-ever Ramadan collection — the Gold Capsule, a limited-edition lineup of iconic pieces in gold, silver, and green. Discover the collection in-store at our Dubai Mall boutique and online here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=253&user=10620>  (UAE) and KSA here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=254&user=10620>  (KSA). Log in with your Chalhoub credentials to enjoy your employee discount at checkout when shopping online.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-7-min.png> 	
Level Shoes reveals ‘Circle of Light’ for Ramadan ’25 
The mood of the campaign is inspired by the moon’s ethereal glow and eternal cycle, a guiding light of the continuity, peace, and stability that anchors Ramadan.The campaign marks the start of the season in which a series of exclusive, limited-edition capsule collections from Level’s leading designers illuminate a rich assortment. The collections for which the shoot offers storytelling include crystal-embellished shoes and sparkling jewelry for women, alongside refined loafers and effortless sandals for men—perfect for elegant evenings with loved ones.
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=255&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-1-min.png> 	

OUR LATEST INTERNAL JOB OPPORTUNITIES
